metadata.title: CVE-2024-49394 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description: In mutt and neomutt the In-Reply-To email header field is not protected bycryptographic signing which allows an attacker to reuse an unencrypted butsigned email message to impersonate the original sender.

criterions.comment: mutt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no fix planned').
neomutt package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
